page.title: 13HOME LIFE RECREATION
page.content: We decided to move to Perton last October, at first we did not dream of coto live here because we did not like the area. But, one house took or fancy. The next thing I knew we were moving. We are now very happy living in Perto and we are pleased that we moved here. The Village provides a good range of entertainments. The Perton Players who perform at the Community Centre are a good example. There are of course Clubs that anyone can join. For children it could be the Saturday Discos or for adults an Evening Institute course run at the Middle School. Perton church also runs a series of actiovities in the community.
